contents: Article 24 (Election of the Chairman) ① The Chairman is elected by the Chairman’s Election Organization. ② The Chairman’s Election Organization is composed of the following people. Revised on November 11, 2022, 1. Delegates pursuant to Article 14 (1) and (2), 2. Member sports organizations (excluding recognized organizations), member city/provincial sports associations, and city/county/district sports associations. Among those who are selected by lottery by the Election Steering Committee under Paragraph 6, 3. One person recommended by the relevant City/County/District Sports Council from among the officers and representatives of the City/County/District Sports Council, ③ An elector under Paragraph 2, Item 2. must be composed in a balanced manner of executives and delegates of the relevant organization or athletes registered in the sports association registration system. Revised 2022. 11. 11., ④ Persons selected by lottery pursuant to Paragraph 2, Item 2 shall be subject to the type of member organization, characteristics of the event (refers to whether it has been adopted as an event for various comprehensive competitions such as the Olympic Games), and size of the event. (Referring to the number of players, etc.), the number can be differentiated considering the size of the city/province, etc. Revised November 11, 2022, ⑤ In accordance with the Olympic Charter, the presidential election body must have a majority of electors representing member sports organizations that have joined the International Federation of Olympic Sports, and in this case, the Olympic sports will be held immediately after the date of the presidential election. It is based on the Olympic Games. Newly established 2017. 6. 8., ⑥ The Athletic Association shall form an election operation committee to handle election-related affairs and make decisions, such as preparing the voter list. ⑦ Deleted 2020. 10. 13., ⑧ Deleted 2020. 10 13., ⑨ Delete 2020. 10. 13., ⑩ Delete 2020. 10. 13.
